title: PDF-attachments are reported as "damaged"
creator: heimler
content: Thunderbird Android Version 13.0 Android Version 15 Fairphone 4, also Samsung Galaxy Tab Active 5. I get an email with a PDF-attachment. I click on "open with Acrobat". Acrobat reports "document cannot be opened, is damaged". I open the same email with GMail. I click on "open with Acrobat". Acrobat opens the PDF without problems. So the PDF is not damaged in the mail, only in Thunderbird-Android.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android 15

title: thunbird email notifications
